message.entry:
工作进程无法在作业开始时将以下文件夹添加到 MATLAB 搜索路径:
{0} 当工作进程具有与客户端不同的文件系统时，可能会出现这种情况。请尝试以下操作之一:
 * 创建作业时，不要在 'AdditionalPaths' 参数中包含这些文件夹。
 * 不要在集群配置文件的 'AdditionalPaths' 字段中包含这些文件夹。
 * 创建作业时将 'AutoAddClientPath' 参数设置为 false，以防止从您的客户端的 MATLAB 搜索路径添加文件夹。
{0,number,integer} 个路径
ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的作业的其他路径:\n{1}
InputArguments parameter must be a cell array.
{0,number,integer} 个文件
ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的作业的附加文件:\n{1}
为 ID 为 {0} 的作业自动添加的文件:\n{1}
列出文件
提交时计算
Creating multiple tasks is not supported for jobs of type {0}.
Tasks can only be added to jobs which are in state ''pending''.
The job was cancelled before it could be run: {0}
A task cannot be added to the running parallel job with ID {0}.
Cannot add tasks to the finished job with ID {0}.
Cannot attach Packaged files to a job.
FileStore objects cannot be loaded from a MAT file or directly created from a constructor.
Job objects cannot be loaded from a MAT file or directly created from a constructor.
ValueStore objects cannot be loaded from a MAT file or directly created from a constructor.
Interactive jobs created using parpool cannot be recreated.
此作业将保持排队状态，直到并行池关闭。
销毁作业时，集群报告错误。错误为: {0}。
Either set NumWorkers on the cluster object to a finite value, or set the limits of NumWorkersRange on the job object to a finite value.
A communicating job must have a single task defined before submission.
Only one task may be created on a communicating Job.
Communicating jobs must have a single task with ID 1. Delete and then recreate your job.
Only one task may be created on a concurrent Job.
并发作业必须恰好包含一个任务。
This concurrent job does not support indirect pool connections.
Unable to read AttachedFiles data.
Cell array of input functions must be the same size as the cell array of input arguments.
Function must be a cell array of function_handle or character vector.
InputArguments parameter must be a cell array of vector cell arrays, or a vector cell array.
NumOutputArguments must be a numeric value or vector of integers.
NumberOfOutputArguments 必须为非负值。
NumOutputArguments must be the same size as the cell array of input arguments.
''{0}'' 尚未提交，其状态仍为 ''挂起''。如果它不是从不同会话提交的，可能会无限期等待。
删除不可用的作业时，集群报告了错误。此作业可能已删除。
{0,number,integer} 个变量
ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的作业的环境变量:\n{1}
执行 ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的任务时出错。
Failed to get the list of licensed products.
An error occurred during execution of user supplied filter function ''{0}'': {1}
findTask requires 0, 1 or 3 output arguments.
作业对象未处于要执行此操作的状态。
仅当作业处于挂起状态时才能提交作业。
The parallel job was cancelled because the number of tasks in the job, {0}, was not equal to 1.
The job cannot be demoted when it is not in the queued state.
The job cannot be promoted when it is not in the queued state.
仅当作业处于排队状态时才能运行作业。
Invalid syntax. Use "delete(job)" to delete a job.
Invalid filter function output. The output value must be an array of logicals with size equal to the input array.
对于 SPMD 作业，SpmdEnabled 必须设置为 true。
Invalid task state. Valid task states are: {0}.
作业已在(或仍在)排队。
Could not access job and task data, possible data corruption.
作业无法运行，并且未返回具体错误消息。这可能是由于调度器无法在集群上正确启动 MATLAB，或在集群上执行作业所需的文件不可用。有关详细信息，请使用 getDebugLog 函数读取作业的调试日志。
作业无法正确运行，因为一个或多个 MATLAB 工作进程在任务执行期间退出。\n{0}
Invalid job object.
仅当作业处于 ''已完成'' 状态时才能获取输出。
Error thrown in user-supplied jobStartup function ''{0}''.
A job must have at least one task to submit.
Outputs cannot be fetched as the job is unavailable.
列出警告
Failed to read/write job data to the database.
New tasks can only be added to a MATLAB Job Scheduler job while the job is in state ''pending'', ''queued'', or ''running''.
The job could not be found.
The worker process was not launched using the "-parallel" flag. This flag is required for communicating jobs.
Compatibility check failed: worker type {0} is not compatible with leading worker type {1}.
Badly formatted parallel tag.
Unknown connection method ({0}).
没有为 ID 为 {0} 的作业自动添加文件。
The {0} seems to have no leading task.
The job was cancelled because there are not enough workers of the same OS and architecture to run a parallel job. Your NumWorkersRange is [{0} {1}], but the number of qualified workers is {2}.
The operation "{0}" can only be performed on jobs in state "pending".
Task with ID {0,number,integer} returned {1,number,integer} outputs but {2,number,integer} were expected.
并行作业必须恰好包含一个任务。
Error thrown in user-supplied poolStartup function ''{0}'.
Properties must be set on jobs in the same MATLAB release that created the job: {0}
{0} is not a valid property input to recreate.
Number of entries in logical array, {0}, must match the number of tasks in the job to be recreated, {1}.
Unable to recreate job with specified tasks. All tasks must be from the original job.
The first input to createTask must be a scalar job object, not a vector of job objects.
调度器分配了 {0,number,integer} 个 ID
调度器为 ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的作业中的任务分配了 ID:\n{1}
Failed to launch SMPD and read startup information.
Failed to launch SMPD process.
Timeout launching SMPD and reading startup information.
无法重新创建存储。基础存储可能已删除。
The entry specified by key ''{0}'' is not present in this store.
Unable to copy folder ''{0}''. FileStore does not support copying folders.
Invalid store callback function specified. Valid functions require 2 input arguments.
Invalid file path ''{0}''.
Invalid store location ''{0}''.
Invalid file permissions on ''{0}''.
Unexpected error querying store.\n{0}
The number of files must match the number of keys.
The number of values must match the number of keys.
ValueStore does not support parenthesis indexing of multiple keys. To reference multiple entries in a single operation use the ''get'' method.
ValueStore does not support parenthesis indexing of multiple keys. To remove multiple entries in a single operation use the ''remove'' method.
ValueStore does not support parenthesis indexing of multiple keys. To assign multiple entries in a single operation use the ''put'' method.
Failed to read entry specified by key ''{0}''.
Failed to write entry specified by key ''{0}''.
Jobs must be submitted in the same MATLAB release that created the job: {0}
Tasks must be created in the same MATLAB release that created the job: {0}
The ''TaskID'' name-value pair can only be used with independent jobs.
The ''TaskState'' name-value pair can only be used with independent jobs.
The ''Tasks'' name-value pair can only be used with independent jobs.
检测到 {0,number,integer} 个具有非默认值的功能控件。只有前 {1,number,integer} 个将被镜像到工作进程。
Too many workers requested. The job requires {0,number,integer}, but the cluster supports a maximum of {1,number,integer}.
Too many workers requested. The job requires {0,number,integer}, but the cluster with profile ''{1}'' supports a maximum of {2,number,integer}.
The NumWorkersRange for the job was unexpectedly invalid.
The job was cancelled by user "{0}" on machine "{1}".
The job was cancelled by user "{0}" on machine "{1}" with message: "{2}".
Unable to get version information from job. This probably means that the job was created in a client MATLAB prior to the R2009a general release, or that the job data files of the job are corrupt.
This job was submitted with version {0} of the Parallel Computing Toolbox. However the current MATLAB Parallel Server is version {1}. You must run jobs from clients on servers with the same version.
ID 为 {0,number,integer} 的任务发出以下警告:\n{1}
Workers in this cluster type do not support "Packages". Start MATLAB without the "-packages" option, or use the "Processes" Cluster profile.
在任务执行期间，MATLAB 工作进程以状态 {0,number,integer} 退出。这是由 MPI 连接超时导致的。如果此问题仍然存在，请联系 MathWorks 技术支持。
在任务执行期间，MATLAB 工作进程以状态 {0,number,integer} 退出。这很可能是 MATLAB 内存不足导致的。
MATLAB worker shut down unexpectedly with status {0,number,integer} during task execution.
